meanings.definition: A monetary unit in Albania, equal to one hundredth of a lek.
meanings.sent1: In Albania, you can buy a lot of candies with just one qindarka.
meanings.sent2: I found a qindarka on the street and used it to buy a small toy.
meanings.sent3: The qindarka rolled away, trying to escape from the other coins.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as bright as a shiny qindarka in the sun.
meanings.sent5: The sound of the qindarka hitting the ground echoed through the alley.

meanings.sent1: I found a qindarka in my pocket and decided to keep it for good luck.
meanings.sent2: The vending machine only accepted qindarkas for the cheapest snacks.
meanings.sent3: The qindarka felt lonely among the other coins in the jar.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was like a jingling bag full of qindarkas.
meanings.sent5: The beggar's eyes lit up when someone dropped a qindarka into his cup.
